metadata.title: PM condoles death of ex-Punjab governor Mian Azhar

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 23 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Tuesday expressed grief over the death of former Governor of Punjab and Member of National Assembly Mian Muhammad Azhar. The prime minister, in a statement, prayed to Allah Almighty for peace for the departed soul. He also prayed for strength to the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
